name: Campaign Rhythm - Spiky Mode
description: Validates narrative rhythm across 6-scene sequence (2 full approach/engage/aftermath cycles) in Spiky rarity mode. Tests whether pressure spikes and releases occur naturally, whether at least one meaningful cutoff event happens, and whether the system avoids both permanent high tension and permanent calm. Uses same seed as Normal mode for comparison.

observe: Pressure spike occurrences and recovery patterns
At least one meaningful cutoff event in sequence
Whether system avoids permanent high tension plateau
Whether system avoids permanent calm (no spikes)
Comparison with Normal mode at same seed

expectations.spikes: At least one scene should show elevated cutoff rate or high severity
expectations.release: Aftermath scenes should reduce pressure without eliminating consequences
expectations.no_plateau: Should not maintain same tension/severity across all 6 scenes
expectations.no_runaway: Should not escalate infinitely without release
expectations.differentiation: Should feel distinctly more volatile than Normal mode
